utilities

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Utility

  • public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    The Utility class provides basic security tools as key pairs and signatures.

        Throws:

      • generateSignature

        public static java.lang.String generateSignature(java.security.PrivateKey privateKey,
                                                 java.lang.String plainText)
                                          throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                 java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                                 java.security.SignatureException,
                                                 java.io.IOException
        Signs the message using the private key of the sender with the DSA algorithm.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - the private key of the sender
        plainText - the plain text format of the message to be signed
        Returns:
        a string-encoded signature
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
        java.security.SignatureException
        java.io.IOException

      • verfiySignature

        public static boolean verfiySignature(java.security.PublicKey pubKey,
                                      java.lang.String plainText,
                                      java.lang.String signature)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Verifies the claimed sender of the message.
        Parameters:
        pubKey - the public key of the sender
        plainText - the plain text format of the message
        signature - the claimed signature of the message
        Returns:
        true if the signature if valid
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • hash

        public static java.lang.String hash(java.lang.String s)
                             throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Hashes the input string using the SHA-265 algorithm.
        Parameters:
        s - the string to hash
        Returns:
        the hashed string
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • isTarget

        public static boolean isTarget(java.lang.String hash)
        Verifies that the hash achieves the targeted proof of work.
        Parameters:
        hash - the hash to verify
        Returns:
        true if the hash achieves the target.
